title: T-shirt/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**

**[English](/wiki/T-shirt "T-shirt")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| \[   T恤衫   [![T-shirt.png](/images/5/55/T-shirt.png)](/wiki/File:T-shirt.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 外观                                                                            | T恤衫                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| 装备槽位                                                                          | [衬衫](/wiki/%E8%A1%AC%E8%A1%AB "衬衫")                                                                                                                                                               |
| AC                                                                            | [0](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%94%B2%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护甲等级 (page does not exist)")                                                                                   |
| 特殊效果                                                                          | - 可以[阅读](/index.php?title=%E9%98%85%E8%AF%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "阅读 (page does not exist)")
- [商店](/index.php?title=%E5%95%86%E5%BA%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "商店 (page does not exist)")涨价 |
|                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| 基础价                                                                           | 2 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                                                                                                             |
| 重量                                                                            | [5](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                       |
| 材料                                                                            | [布](/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "布 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                 |

**T恤衫**（T-shirt）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[衬衫](/wiki/%E8%A1%AC%E8%A1%AB "衬衫")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[布](/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "布 (page does not exist)")制成。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)
  - [2.1 T恤衫文本](#T.E6.81.A4.E8.A1.AB.E6.96.87.E6.9C.AC)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.2 TNNT (the game)](#TNNT_.28the_game.29)
  - [5.3 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [5.4 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

T恤衫在随机生成防具中占0.2%。

## 描述

T恤衫的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为0。

若玩家对T恤衫进行[阅读](/index.php?title=%E9%98%85%E8%AF%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "阅读 (page does not exist)")操作，游戏会输出一条消息，显示T恤衫上的一段文本，同时打破角色的文盲[行为](/index.php?title=%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "行为 (page does not exist)")[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。T恤衫上的文本取决于其物品ID，因此每件T恤衫上的文本只要一生成就不会变化。如果T恤衫被[侵蚀](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%B5%E8%9A%80\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侵蚀 (page does not exist)")，其上的文本也会受损[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

若在将T恤衫穿在最外面（即不穿戴[铠甲](/wiki/%E9%93%A0%E7%94%B2 "铠甲")或[斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")）时进入[商店](/index.php?title=%E5%95%86%E5%BA%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "商店 (page does not exist)")，则[店主](/index.php?title=%E5%BA%97%E4%B8%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "店主 (page does not exist)")会将商品的卖出价提高1⁄3，且基础买入价降低到基础价的1⁄3。

### T恤衫文本

T恤衫上可能出现的文本如下[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)：

- "I explored the [Dungeons of Doom](/index.php?title=Dungeons_of_Doom/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Dungeons of Doom/zh-CN (page does not exist)") and all I got was this lousy T-shirt!"
- "Is that [Mjollnir](/index.php?title=Mjollnir/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Mjollnir/zh-CN (page does not exist)") in your pocket or are you just happy to see me?"
- "It's not the size of your sword, it's how [#enhance](/index.php?title=Enhance/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Enhance/zh-CN (page does not exist)")’d you are with it."
- "Madame Elvira's House O' [Succubi](/index.php?title=Succubi/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Succubi/zh-CN (page does not exist)") Lifetime Customer"
- "Madame Elvira's House O' Succubi Employee of the Month"
- "[Ludios](/index.php?title=Fort_Ludios/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Fort Ludios/zh-CN (page does not exist)") [Vault](/index.php?title=Vault/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Vault/zh-CN (page does not exist)") Guards Do It In Small, Dark Rooms"
- "Yendor Military [Soldiers](/index.php?title=Soldier/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Soldier/zh-CN (page does not exist)") Do It In Large Groups"
- "I survived Yendor Military Boot Camp"
- "Ludios Accounting School Intra-Mural Lacrosse Team"
- "[Oracle](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E8%B0%95%EF%BC%88%E6%A5%BC%E5%B1%82%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神谕（楼层） (page does not exist)")(TM) Fountains 10th Annual Wet T-Shirt Contest"
- "Hey, [black dragon](/index.php?title=Black_dragon/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Black dragon/zh-CN (page does not exist)")! Disintegrate THIS!"
- "I'm With Stupid -->"
- "Don't blame me, I voted for [Izchak](/index.php?title=Izchak/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Izchak/zh-CN (page does not exist)")!"
- "Don't Panic"
- "Furinkan High School Athletic Dept."
- "Hel-LOOO, [Nurse](/index.php?title=Nurse/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Nurse/zh-CN (page does not exist)")!"
- "=^.^=",
- "100% [goblin](/index.php?title=Goblin/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Goblin/zh-CN (page does not exist)") hair - do not wash"
- "Aberzombie and Fitch"
- "cK -- [Cockatrice](/index.php?title=Cockatrice/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Cockatrice/zh-CN (page does not exist)") touches the [Kop](/index.php?title=%E5%90%89%E6%96%AF%E9%80%9A%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E7%B1%BB%E5%88%AB%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "吉斯通警察（怪物类别） (page does not exist)")"
- "Don't ask me, I only adventure here"
- "Down with pants!"
- "d, your dog or a killer?"
- "FREE [PUG AND NEWT](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师任务 (page does not exist)")!"
- "Go [team ant](/index.php?title=Team_Ant/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Team Ant/zh-CN (page does not exist)")!"
- "Got [newt](/index.php?title=Newt/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Newt/zh-CN (page does not exist)")?"
- "Hello, my darlings!"
- "Hey! [Nymphs](/index.php?title=Nymphs/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Nymphs/zh-CN (page does not exist)")! Steal This T-Shirt!"
- "I <3 Dungeon of Doom"
- "I <3 [Maud](/index.php?title=Maud/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Maud/zh-CN (page does not exist)")"
- "I am a [Valkyrie](/index.php?title=Valkyrie/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Valkyrie/zh-CN (page does not exist)"). If you see me running, try to keep up."
- "I am not a pack rat - I am a collector"
- "I bounced off a rubber tree"
- "Plunder Island Brimstone Beach Club"
- "If you can read this, I can hit you with my [polearm](/wiki/Polearm/zh-CN "Polearm/zh-CN")"
- "I'm [confused](/index.php?title=Confused/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Confused/zh-CN (page does not exist)")!"
- "I scored with the princess"
- "I want to [live forever](/index.php?title=Ascension/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Ascension/zh-CN (page does not exist)") or [die](/index.php?title=Dying/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Dying/zh-CN (page does not exist)") in the attempt."
- "[Lichen](/index.php?title=Lichen/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Lichen/zh-CN (page does not exist)") Park"
- "LOST IN THOUGHT - please send search party"
- "Meat is Mordor"
- "[Minetown](/index.php?title=Minetown/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Minetown/zh-CN (page does not exist)") Better Business Bureau"
- "Minetown [Watch](/index.php?title=Watch/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Watch/zh-CN (page does not exist)")"
- "Ms. Palm's House of Negotiable Affection -- A Very Reputable House Of Disrepute"
- "[Protection Racketeer](/index.php?title=Protection_racket/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Protection racket/zh-CN (page does not exist)")"
- "Real men love [Crom](/index.php?title=Crom/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Crom/zh-CN (page does not exist)")"
- "Somebody stole my [Mojo](/index.php?title=Mjollnir/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Mjollnir/zh-CN (page does not exist)")!"
- "The [Hellhound](/index.php?title=Hellhound/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Hellhound/zh-CN (page does not exist)") Gang"
- "The [Werewolves](/index.php?title=Werewolf/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Werewolf/zh-CN (page does not exist)")"
- "They Might Be [Storm Giants](/index.php?title=Storm_giant/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Storm giant/zh-CN (page does not exist)")"
- "Weapons don't kill people, I kill people"
- "White Zombie"
- "You're killing me!"
- "[Anhur](/index.php?title=Anhur/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Anhur/zh-CN (page does not exist)") State University - Home of the Fighting [Fire Ants](/index.php?title=Fire_ant/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Fire ant/zh-CN (page does not exist)")!"
- "FREE HUGS"
- "[Serial Ascender](/index.php?title=Streak/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Streak/zh-CN (page does not exist)")"
- "Real men are valkyries"
- "Young Men's Cavedigging Association"
- "Occupy Fort Ludios"
- "I couldn't afford this T-shirt so I stole it!"
- "[Mind flayers](/index.php?title=Mind_flayer/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Mind flayer/zh-CN (page does not exist)") suck"
- "I'm not wearing any pants"
- "Down with the living!"
- "[Pudding farmer](/index.php?title=Pudding_farming/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Pudding farming/zh-CN (page does not exist)")"
- "[Vegetarian](/index.php?title=Vegetarian/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Vegetarian/zh-CN (page does not exist)")"
- "Hello, I'm [War](/index.php?title=War/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "War/zh-CN (page does not exist)")!"
- "It is better to light a [candle](/index.php?title=Candle/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Candle/zh-CN (page does not exist)") than to curse the darkness"
- "It is easier to curse the darkness than to light a candle"
- "[rock](/index.php?title=Rock/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Rock/zh-CN (page does not exist)")--[paper](/index.php?title=Scroll_of_blank_paper/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Scroll of blank paper/zh-CN (page does not exist)")--scissors--[lizard](/index.php?title=Lizard/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Lizard/zh-CN (page does not exist)")--Spock!"（本句来自美剧《生活大爆炸》）
- "/Valar morghulis/ -- /Valar dohaeris/"（奇幻小说《冰与火之歌》系列中的[常用语](https://asoiaf.huijiwiki.com/wiki/Valar_Morghulis)）

## 策略

和夏威夷衬衫一样，T恤衫一般用来在提升附魔后穿在铠甲里面提供额外的防御。但要注意，如果你意外被[变形陷阱](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2%E9%99%B7%E9%98%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "变形陷阱 (page does not exist)")变形，你的躯干防具可能被撑破，因此最好在获得针对变形的保护措施后再穿衬衫。在游戏前期，建议优先用[防具附魔卷轴](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94%E5%8D%B7%E8%BD%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "防具附魔卷轴 (page does not exist)")来强化[头盔](/wiki/%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "头盔")、[靴子](/wiki/%E9%9D%B4%E5%AD%90 "靴子")或[手套](/wiki/%E6%89%8B%E5%A5%97 "手套")之类不易损失的防具。如果你有多余的[许愿](/index.php?title=%E8%AE%B8%E6%84%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "许愿 (page does not exist)")机会，你可以考虑许愿获取附魔的夏威夷衬衫来补足你的[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")。

如果不介意使用[批量变形](/index.php?title=%E6%89%B9%E9%87%8F%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "批量变形 (page does not exist)")，你可以通过[变形](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "变形 (page does not exist)")一大堆防具（可以从[城堡](/index.php?title=%E5%9F%8E%E5%A0%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "城堡 (page does not exist)")或[吕底人堡垒](/index.php?title=%E5%90%95%E5%BA%95%E4%BA%BA%E5%A0%A1%E5%9E%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "吕底人堡垒 (page does not exist)")获得大量防具）来获得衬衫。城堡里的防具仓库有13.13%的概率生成至少一件衬衫，[奥迦斯镇](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%A5%E8%BF%A6%E6%96%AF%E9%95%87\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "奥迦斯镇 (page does not exist)")中的废弃商店也可能出现衬衫。

## 历史

T恤衫最初于[NetHack 3.2.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.0 "NetHack 3.2.0")加入游戏，它只有在开启了`TOURIST`[编译时选项](/index.php?title=%E7%BC%96%E8%AF%91%E6%97%B6%E9%80%89%E9%A1%B9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "编译时选项 (page does not exist)")后才能在游戏里生成。到[NetHack 3.3.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.3.1 "NetHack 3.3.1")为止，T恤衫上可能出现的文字只有以下三种[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)：

- "I explored the Dungeons of Doom, but all I got was this lousy T-shirt"

  在正常情况下会出现的文本。

- "I explored the Dungeons of Doom, and never did any laundry..."

  在玩家正穿着T恤衫，且处于[幻觉](/index.php?title=%E5%B9%BB%E8%A7%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "幻觉 (page does not exist)")状态时会出现的文本。

- "I explored the Dungeons of Doom, and couldn't find my way out"

  同上，但玩家未穿着T恤衫。

在[NetHack 3.4.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.0 "NetHack 3.4.0")版本，T恤衫新增了大量来自[Scott Bigham的补丁](http://www.killerbunnies.org/nethack/3.3.1/tshirt.diff)的文本，在[NetHack 3.6.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.0 "NetHack 3.6.0")和[NetHack 3.6.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.1 "NetHack 3.6.1")版本中，T恤衫的文本进一步增加。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=T-shirt/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), the [Tie-Dye Shirt of Shambhala](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Tie-Dye_Shirt_of_Shambhala "DNetHack artifacts") is an unaligned [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") T-shirt that can be enchanted to +7, and alters carrying capacity while worn: it confers a 1⁄2 increase while blessed, a 1⁄4 increase while uncursed, and a 1⁄4 *penalty* while cursed. The shirt also enhances charisma if worn without body armor and enhances wisdom if worn with it, and can be read to cure status properties like a [unicorn horn](/wiki/Unicorn_horn "Unicorn horn") if not covered by non-crystal body armor. Invoking the Tie-Dye Shirt confers [enlightenment](/wiki/Enlightenment "Enlightenment").

### TNNT (the game)

In [TNNT (the game)](/wiki/TNNT_\(the_game\) "TNNT (the game)"), the reward for completing [the DevTeam Office](/wiki/The_DevTeam_Office "The DevTeam Office") quest is the [Really Cool Shirt](/wiki/Really_Cool_Shirt "Really Cool Shirt"), an artifact T-shirt that acts as a [luck item](/wiki/Luck_item "Luck item") while carried and provides [warning](/wiki/Warning "Warning") while worn. Reading the Really Cool Shirt has a 49⁄50 chance of producing a random rumor according to its beatitude: true only if blessed, false only if cursed, or either if uncursed. Due to its generation method, it will revert to a normal T-shirt if left in a [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones") file.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), T-shirts can be made of other materials such as [leather](/wiki/Leather "Leather"), which provides some base [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") and may make them more valuable to wear early on. Shirt wishes are just as popular as in *NetHack* if not more so: [object materials](/wiki/Object_materials_\(EvilHack\) "Object materials (EvilHack)") and [properties](/wiki/Object_properties "Object properties") make the shirt slot valuable for characters that are not [giants](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)") or [tortles](/wiki/Tortle_\(starting_race\) "Tortle (starting race)"). An example of such a wish is "blessed greased fixed +3 [dragonhide](/wiki/Dragonhide "Dragonhide") T-shirt of decay", with "decay" being an object property that provides [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), T-shirts can only be made of cloth. [Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a T-shirt will produce a [striped shirt](/wiki/Striped_shirt "Striped shirt"), and vice versa.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/read.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 161](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/read.c#L161)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/read.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 162](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/read.c#L162)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/read.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 81](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/read.c#L81)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [read.c in NetHack 3.3.0, line 86](/wiki/Source:NetHack_3.3.0/read.c#line86 "Source:NetHack 3.3.0/read.c")

html:
T-shirt/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< T-shirt
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[   T恤衫  
外观 T恤衫
装备槽位 衬衫
AC 0
特殊效果
  • 可以阅读
  • 商店涨价
基础价 2 zm
重量 5
材料 布

T恤衫（T-shirt）是NetHack中的一种衬衫类防具。它由布制成。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
    • 2.1 T恤衫文本
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 dNetHack
    • 5.2 TNNT (the game)
    • 5.3 EvilHack
    • 5.4 Hack'EM
  • 6 引用及注释

生成

T恤衫在随机生成防具中占0.2%。

描述

T恤衫的基础AC加成为0。

若玩家对T恤衫进行阅读操作，游戏会输出一条消息，显示T恤衫上的一段文本，同时打破角色的文盲行为[1]。T恤衫上的文本取决于其物品ID，因此每件T恤衫上的文本只要一生成就不会变化。如果T恤衫被侵蚀，其上的文本也会受损[2]。

若在将T恤衫穿在最外面（即不穿戴铠甲或斗篷）时进入商店，则店主会将商品的卖出价提高1⁄3，且基础买入价降低到基础价的1⁄3。

T恤衫文本

T恤衫上可能出现的文本如下[3]：

  • "I explored the Dungeons of Doom and all I got was this lousy T-shirt!"
  • "Is that Mjollnir in your pocket or are you just happy to see me?"
  • "It's not the size of your sword, it's how #enhance’d you are with it."
  • "Madame Elvira's House O' Succubi Lifetime Customer"
  • "Madame Elvira's House O' Succubi Employee of the Month"
  • "Ludios Vault Guards Do It In Small, Dark Rooms"
  • "Yendor Military Soldiers Do It In Large Groups"
  • "I survived Yendor Military Boot Camp"
  • "Ludios Accounting School Intra-Mural Lacrosse Team"
  • "Oracle(TM) Fountains 10th Annual Wet T-Shirt Contest"
  • "Hey, black dragon! Disintegrate THIS!"
  • "I'm With Stupid -->"
  • "Don't blame me, I voted for Izchak!"
  • "Don't Panic"
  • "Furinkan High School Athletic Dept."
  • "Hel-LOOO, Nurse!"
  • "=^.^=",
  • "100% goblin hair - do not wash"
  • "Aberzombie and Fitch"
  • "cK -- Cockatrice touches the Kop"
  • "Don't ask me, I only adventure here"
  • "Down with pants!"
  • "d, your dog or a killer?"
  • "FREE PUG AND NEWT!"
  • "Go team ant!"
  • "Got newt?"
  • "Hello, my darlings!"
  • "Hey! Nymphs! Steal This T-Shirt!"
  • "I <3 Dungeon of Doom"
  • "I <3 Maud"
  • "I am a Valkyrie. If you see me running, try to keep up."
  • "I am not a pack rat - I am a collector"
  • "I bounced off a rubber tree"
  • "Plunder Island Brimstone Beach Club"
  • "If you can read this, I can hit you with my polearm"
  • "I'm confused!"
  • "I scored with the princess"
  • "I want to live forever or die in the attempt."
  • "Lichen Park"
  • "LOST IN THOUGHT - please send search party"
  • "Meat is Mordor"
  • "Minetown Better Business Bureau"
  • "Minetown Watch"
  • "Ms. Palm's House of Negotiable Affection -- A Very Reputable House Of Disrepute"
  • "Protection Racketeer"
  • "Real men love Crom"
  • "Somebody stole my Mojo!"
  • "The Hellhound Gang"
  • "The Werewolves"
  • "They Might Be Storm Giants"
  • "Weapons don't kill people, I kill people"
  • "White Zombie"
  • "You're killing me!"
  • "Anhur State University - Home of the Fighting Fire Ants!"
  • "FREE HUGS"
  • "Serial Ascender"
  • "Real men are valkyries"
  • "Young Men's Cavedigging Association"
  • "Occupy Fort Ludios"
  • "I couldn't afford this T-shirt so I stole it!"
  • "Mind flayers suck"
  • "I'm not wearing any pants"
  • "Down with the living!"
  • "Pudding farmer"
  • "Vegetarian"
  • "Hello, I'm War!"
  • "It is better to light a candle than to curse the darkness"
  • "It is easier to curse the darkness than to light a candle"
  • "rock--paper--scissors--lizard--Spock!"（本句来自美剧《生活大爆炸》）
  • "/Valar morghulis/ -- /Valar dohaeris/"（奇幻小说《冰与火之歌》系列中的常用语）

策略

和夏威夷衬衫一样，T恤衫一般用来在提升附魔后穿在铠甲里面提供额外的防御。但要注意，如果你意外被变形陷阱变形，你的躯干防具可能被撑破，因此最好在获得针对变形的保护措施后再穿衬衫。在游戏前期，建议优先用防具附魔卷轴来强化头盔、靴子或手套之类不易损失的防具。如果你有多余的许愿机会，你可以考虑许愿获取附魔的夏威夷衬衫来补足你的飞升套件。

如果不介意使用批量变形，你可以通过变形一大堆防具（可以从城堡或吕底人堡垒获得大量防具）来获得衬衫。城堡里的防具仓库有13.13%的概率生成至少一件衬衫，奥迦斯镇中的废弃商店也可能出现衬衫。

历史

T恤衫最初于NetHack 3.2.0加入游戏，它只有在开启了TOURIST编译时选项后才能在游戏里生成。到NetHack 3.3.1为止，T恤衫上可能出现的文字只有以下三种[4]：

"I explored the Dungeons of Doom, but all I got was this lousy T-shirt"
在正常情况下会出现的文本。
"I explored the Dungeons of Doom, and never did any laundry..."
在玩家正穿着T恤衫，且处于幻觉状态时会出现的文本。
"I explored the Dungeons of Doom, and couldn't find my way out"
同上，但玩家未穿着T恤衫。

在NetHack 3.4.0版本，T恤衫新增了大量来自Scott Bigham的补丁的文本，在NetHack 3.6.0和NetHack 3.6.1版本中，T恤衫的文本进一步增加。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, the Tie-Dye Shirt of Shambhala is an unaligned artifact T-shirt that can be enchanted to +7, and alters carrying capacity while worn: it confers a 1⁄2 increase while blessed, a 1⁄4 increase while uncursed, and a 1⁄4 penalty while cursed. The shirt also enhances charisma if worn without body armor and enhances wisdom if worn with it, and can be read to cure status properties like a unicorn horn if not covered by non-crystal body armor. Invoking the Tie-Dye Shirt confers enlightenment.

TNNT (the game)

In TNNT (the game), the reward for completing the DevTeam Office quest is the Really Cool Shirt, an artifact T-shirt that acts as a luck item while carried and provides warning while worn. Reading the Really Cool Shirt has a 49⁄50 chance of producing a random rumor according to its beatitude: true only if blessed, false only if cursed, or either if uncursed. Due to its generation method, it will revert to a normal T-shirt if left in a bones file.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, T-shirts can be made of other materials such as leather, which provides some base AC and may make them more valuable to wear early on. Shirt wishes are just as popular as in NetHack if not more so: object materials and properties make the shirt slot valuable for characters that are not giants or tortles. An example of such a wish is "blessed greased fixed +3 dragonhide T-shirt of decay", with "decay" being an object property that provides drain resistance.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, T-shirts can only be made of cloth. Upgrading a T-shirt will produce a striped shirt, and vice versa.

3.4.0]]版本，T恤衫新增了大量来自[http://www.killerbunnies.org/nethack/3.3.1/tshirt.diff Scott Bigham的补丁]的文本，在[[NetHack 3.6.0]]和[[NetHack 3.6.1]]版本中，T恤衫的文本进一步增加。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], the [[dNetHack artifacts#Tie-Dye Shirt of Shambhala|Tie-Dye Shirt of Shambhala]] is an unaligned [[artifact]] T-shirt that can be enchanted to +7, and alters carrying capacity while worn: it confers a {{frac|2}} increase while blessed, a {{frac|4}} increase while uncursed, and a {{frac|4}} ''penalty'' while cursed. The shirt also enhances charisma if worn without body armor and enhances wisdom if worn with it, and can be read to cure status properties like a [[unicorn horn]] if not covered by non-crystal body armor. Invoking the Tie-Dye Shirt confers [[enlightenment]]. ===TNNT (the game)=== In [[TNNT (the game)]], the reward for completing [[the DevTeam Office]] quest is the [[Really Cool Shirt]], an artifact T-shirt that acts as a [[luck item]] while carried and provides [[warning]] while worn. Reading the Really Cool Shirt has a {{frac|49|50}} chance of producing a random rumor according to its beatitude: true only if blessed, false only if cursed, or either if uncursed. Due to its generation method, it will revert to a normal T-shirt if left in a [[bones]] file. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], T-shirts can be made of other materials such as [[leather]], which provides some base [[AC]] and may make them more valuable to wear early on. Shirt wishes are just as popular as in ''NetHack'' if not more so: [[Object materials (EvilHack)|object materials]] and [[Object properties|properties]] make the shirt slot valuable for characters that are not [[Giant (starting race)|giants]] or [[Tortle (starting race)|tortles]]. An example of such a wish is "blessed greased fixed +3 [[dragonhide]] T-shirt of decay", with "decay" being an object property that provides [[drain resistance]]. ===Hack'EM=== In [[Hack'EM]], T-shirts can only be made of cloth. [[Upgrading]] a T-shirt will produce a [[striped shirt]], and vice versa. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Shirts/zh-CN|TXUSHAN]]
